lead_paragraph: An article on Saturday about Keith Hernandez, a lively part of the Mets’ TV broadcast team, misspelled the given name of the SNY producer credited with encouraging him to be playful on the air. He is Gregg Picker, not Greg.
snippet: An article on Saturday about Keith Hernandez, a lively part of the Mets’ TV broadcast team, misspelled the given name of the SNY producer credited with encouraging him to be playful on the air. He is Gregg Picker, not Greg.
